title: Natural Medicines - Databases
cleaned_text: - Subscription Type - SUBSCRIPTION - Publisher - Therapeutic Research Center (TRC) - Languages - English - Resource Types - E-Books and E-Texts, Reference Source - Description - Database on dietary supplements, herbal medicines, and complementary and integrative therapies. The database includes interactive tools for safety, effectiveness and interactions of foods, herbs and supplements, as well as over 1,400 ebooks on natural ingredients, including vitamins, herbs, minerals, non-herbal supplements, naturally sourced chemical compounds, and foods.
